text: "Step by Step" is a 1990 song by New Kids on the Block and is the title track to their 1990 album Step by Step. It was originally recorded by Maurice Starr's other group The Superiors and released as a single in 1987 by Motown Records and was not successful. It was covered by New Kids on the Block and topped the charts in the United States, Spain and Canada, number 2 in the United Kingdom and Greece and number 3 in Norway and New Zealand. ==Track listings== * US and Canada 7-inch single #"Step by Step" - 4:27 #"Valentine Girl" - 3:57 * CD single #"Step by Step" - 4:27 #"Valentine Girl" - 3:57 *Maxi-CD #"Step by Step" (Radio Edit) - 3:59 #"Step by Step" (LP Version) - 4:27 #"Step by Step" (12" Club Remix) - 5:25 == References == Category:1987 songs Category:Dance-pop songs Category:New Kids on the Block songs
